title: How the immune system maintains a healthy gut microbiota

title_detail.value: How the immune system maintains a healthy gut microbiota

summary: Researchers have uncovered a critical mechanism that controls immune reactions against microorganisms in the intestine. The results of the international study may contribute to the development of new therapies for chronic inflammatory bowel disease.

summary_detail.value: Researchers have uncovered a critical mechanism that controls immune reactions against microorganisms in the intestine. The results of the international study may contribute to the development of new therapies for chronic inflammatory bowel disease.
